charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went to the beach
and found Archie and Kyogre there.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1101_0200:
It looked like Archie wasn’t doing anything in
particular except watching Kyogre float in
the ocean.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_0900: This is my favorite beach on this island.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1000:
So whenever I have some free time, I come here
with Kyogre.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1100:
If you’ve come all the way here, why don’t you
join me and take in the sight of this
beautiful ocean?
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_0401_1300: Yeah. Let its beauty wash over you.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_0402_1500: Bwahaha! You have good taste, kid.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1600:
It really is breathtaking. Don’t you feel like it’s
cleansing your soul just to look at it?
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1700:
The ocean is a precious place for all living
creatures.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1800:
But humans have dirtied and destroyed it for the
sake of their egos...
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_1900:
How selfish can people be? I can’t live in a world
where we hurt innocent Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2000:
That’s why my mission is to expand this beautiful,
thriving ocean!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2100:
Pasio may be an artificial island, but the ocean it
was built on is a marvel of nature.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2200:
I hope this island can become a
Pokémon paradise!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2300:
I’m sure if we use Pasio’s technology to make the
ocean a better place, more Pokémon can live on
this island as they please!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2400:
Until now, humans have destroyed nature and left
Pokémon without a place to live!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2500:
But maybe this time, an artificial island made by
humans can save those Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2600: Team Aqua will make these ambitions a reality!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2700: In order to do that, we need more people.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2800:
Scouting sync pairs here on Pasio to join our team
is an important part of my job!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_2900:
We gotta take care of the riffraff that gets in the
way of us creating a better environment
for Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_0401_3100:
Heh... So you think humans are just as important
as Pokémon, huh?
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_0302_3200: We have to protect people, too!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_0402_3300:
Heh... So you think humans are just as important
as Pokémon, huh?
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_3400: Bwahahaha! You’re an interesting little scamp!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_3500:
Fine by me! If that’s what you believe, back it up
by showin’ me what you’re made of!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_3600:
If you can prove your strength here on Pasio, I’ll
let you join Team Aqua!
charaepi_ch0193_00_aogiri/2301_1201_3800:
I’ll save you a spot in our ranks, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
